content.en: Breast cancer prediction: Researchers are using algorithms to analyze breast cancer data from MRI scans and clinical information in order to predict various outcomes. These algorithms, such as machine learning classifiers and radiomic analysis, are being used to determine molecular subtypes of breast cancer, predict response to chemotherapy, and even predict the likelihood of tumor recurrence. By harnessing the power of these algorithms, scientists hope to improve diagnosis and treatment options for breast cancer patients.
content.da: Brystkræftforudsigelse: Forskere bruger algoritmer til at analysere brystkræftdata fra MR-scanninger og klinisk information for at forudsige forskellige udfald. Disse algoritmer, såsom maskinlæringsklassifikatorer og radiomisk analyse, anvendes til at bestemme molekylære subtyper af brystkræft, forudsige respons på kemoterapi og endda forudsige sandsynligheden for tumorrecidiv. Ved at udnytte kraften i disse algoritmer håber forskere at forbedre diagnose- og behandlingsmulighederne for brystkræftpatienter.
